This repo contains code to create and deploy a sample Shiny app using Docker and Google Cloud Run

# Resources

The following resources were helpful in creating this app.

- Mark Edmonson's [tutorial on deploying Shiny apps through GCR](https://code.markedmondson.me/shiny-cloudrun/)
- Mark Edmonson's site describing [use cases for CloudRunner](https://code.markedmondson.me/googleCloudRunner/articles/usecases.html#deploy-a-shiny-app-to-google-kubernetes-engine-1)
- Vaibhav Agarwal's [tutorial on deploying Shiny apps through GCR](https://medium.com/engineered-publicis-sapient/google-cloud-run-best-bet-to-host-shiny-application-3aa1e18770a9)
